keyPoints: Developed and maintained Angular components in a large-scale app.
Built REST APIs using Spring Boot and Java.
Wrote complex SQL queries for enterprise data handling.
Collaborated in Agile teams and followed clean code practices.
Worked with JWT, microservices, and MongoDB in backend services.
Led development of key mobile screens and navigation flows.
Integrated third-party APIs and handled mobile data syncing.
Worked closely with the design team to match Figma UI precisely.
Optimized React and React Native code for performance.
Built pixel-perfect mobile UIs using React Native and Expo.
Collaborated with senior developers on component-based architecture.
Learned Git workflows, code reviews, and Agile practices.
Gained exposure to real-world React projects and REST API usage.
